# CNV frequency in Progenetix database
## Invasive Breast Carcinoma (NCIT:C9245)

### Install packages

```{r}
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github('progenetix/pgxRpi')
library(pgxRpi)
install.packages("markdown")
```

### Access the CNV frequency data (Invasive Breast Carcinoma (NCIT:C9245))

```{r}
freq <- pgxLoader(type='frequency', output='pgxseg',filters='NCIT:C9245', codematches=TRUE)
```

### Visualize the data

```{r,fig.width=12,fig.height=6}
pgxFreqplot(freq)
```

```{r,fig.width=12,fig.height=6}
for (i in 1:24) {
  pgxFreqplot(freq, chrom= i)
}

```
